oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carr Payne family collie dog, 1939 May 18
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: The Carr Payne family’s beautiful collie dog. Mr. Payne, a successful Nashville businessman bred collies as a hobby, was a primary founder of the Nashville Kennel Club. Their residence, cited in the 1940 City Directory, was located on Golf Club Lane. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Payne family
Collie; Dogs; Pets; Household animals
